content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems to be in a great location with all the necessary amenities nearby. I'm interested in renting it, but the price is an important factor for me. Could you tell me more about the pricing?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Of course, Mr. Wang. I understand that price is an important consideration for you. I'm looking to get the best deal possible, but I'm also willing to negotiate. What is your budget for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm flexible with my budget, but I'd like to find a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you tell me what the starting price is for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Wang. I believe the starting price for the rent is €850 per month. This includes all utilities and a one-time cleaning fee of €100. What do you think of this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €850 per month, including utilities and a one-time cleaning fee of €100, is a good starting point. However, I'd like to discuss if there's any room for negotiation on the price. Could we perhaps lower the rent to €800 per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but €800 per month is below my asking price. However, I'm willing to consider a slight reduction for a long-term tenant. How long do you plan to rent the apartment for?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking to rent the apartment for at least one year, with the possibility of extending the lease if both parties are satisfied. Would a one-year commitment with the option for renewal be acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: A one-year commitment with the option for renewal is acceptable to me. If you're willing to pay €825 per month, I think we can reach an agreement. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €825 per month is closer to my budget. However, I'd like to see if we can work out an even better deal. Would you be willing to include some additional services or amenities to sweeten the deal?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but as a landlord, I'm looking to keep things simple and straightforward. A clean apartment, in a great location, for a fair price. €825 per month is a good deal for both parties. Are you willing to accept this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €825 per month is very tempting. I appreciate the simplicity of the agreement. However, I'd like to push a bit further to see if we can reach €800 per month, considering the long-term commitment and the unfurnished state of the apartment. Would you be willing to negotiate further on the price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but €800 per month is simply not possible. My offer of €825 per month is final. If you're interested in the apartment at this price, we can proceed with the lease. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other potential tenants.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position. Your offer of €825 per month is indeed a fair one, considering the location and amenities. I'm prepared to accept this offer and move forward with the lease. I agree to the price of €825 Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful news, Mr. Wang! I'm glad to hear that we have reached an agreement. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
